text.div:
CARINConsumerDirectedPayerDataExchange

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.carin-bb

CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange

name: CARINConsumerDirectedPayerDataExchange
title: CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange
description: CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange

resource.name: CARIN BB Explanation Of Benefit
resource.description:
Abstract parent profile that includes constraints that are common to the four specific ExplanationOfBenefit (EOB) profiles defined in this Implementation Guide.
All EOB instances should be from one of the four non-abstract EOB profiles defined in this Implementation Guide:  Inpatient, Outpatient, Pharmacy, and Professional/NonClinician

resource.name: CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit Inpatient Facility
resource.description:
The profile is used for Explanation of Benefits (EOBs) based on claims submitted by clinics, hospitals, skilled nursing facilities and other institutions for inpatient services, which may include the use of equipment and supplies, laboratory services, radiology services and other charges. Inpatient claims are submitted for services rendered at a facility as part of an overnight stay. 
The claims data is based on the institutional claim format UB-04, submission standards adopted by the Department of Health and Human Services as form CMS-1450.

resource.name: CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit Outpatient Facility
resource.description:
This profile is used for Explanation of Benefits (EOBs) based on claims submitted by clinics, hospitals, skilled nursing facilities and other institutions for outpatient services, which may include including the use of equipment and supplies, laboratory services, radiology services and other charges. Outpatient claims are submitted for services rendered at a facility that are not part of an overnight stay. 
The claims data is based on the institutional claim form UB-04, submission standards adopted by the Department of Health and Human Services as form CMS-1450.

resource.name: CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit Pharmacy
resource.description:
This profile is used for Explanation of Benefits (EOBs) based on claims submitted by retail pharmacies. 
The claims data is based on submission standards adopted by the Department of Health and Human Services defined by NCPDP (National Council for Prescription Drug Program)

resource.name: CARIN BB ExplanationOfBenefit Professional NonClinician
resource.description:
This profile is used for Explanation of Benefits (EOBs) based on claims submitted by physicians, suppliers and other non-institutional providers for professional services. These services may be rendered in inpatient or outpatient, including office locations. 
The claims data is based on the professional claim form 1500, submission standards adopted by the Department of Health and Human Services as form CMS-1500.

resource.name: AMA CPT and CMS HCPCS Procedure Codes
resource.description: AMA CPT and CMS HCPCS Procedure Codes

resource.name: AMA CPT and CMS HCPCS Modifier Codes
resource.description: AMA CPT and CMS HCPCS Modifier Codes

resource.name: Adjudication CARINBB Value Codes
resource.description: As per Jira FHIR-26992... HL7 Requested to fix HL7 Adjudication codesystem

resource.name: Adjudication Denial Reason
resource.description: Reason codes used to interpret the adjudication denial reason.  X12 CARC + CMS RARC

resource.name: Benefit Payment Status
resource.description: Indicates the in network or out of network payment status of the claim.

resource.name: CARINBB Institutional Claim Care Team Roles
resource.description: Indicates the role of the provider providing the care.

resource.name: CARINBB Pharmacy CareTeam Roles
resource.description: Indicates the role of the provider providing the care.

resource.name: CARINBB Professional and Non-Clinician CareTeam Roles
resource.description: Indicates the role of the provider providing the care.

resource.name: CMS Place of Service
resource.description: https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/place-of-service-codes/Place_of_Service_Code_Set.html .  The link takes one to the Place of Service list as an html document; it is not a file to which an IG can be bound.   The code set is owned by CMS and is available for use.

resource.name: Claim Adjudication Category
resource.description: Values for EOB.item.adjudication.category, as per Igor

resource.name: Claim Information Category
resource.description: Claim Information Category - Used as the discriminator for supportingInfo

resource.name: Claim Payment Status Code
resource.description: Indicates whether the claim / item was paid or denied.

resource.name: FDA NDC NCPDP Compound Code
resource.description: NCPDP field # 407-D7 (National Drug Code (NDC)) or NCPDP field # 406-D6 (Compound Code)

resource.name: ICD-10-CM Diagnosis Codes
resource.description: ICD-10-CM Diagnosis Codes.  ***We need ALL Codes, inactive and inactive.   Current binding is to active codes only***

resource.name: Payer Adjudication Amount Category
resource.description: This describes the various amount fields used when payers receive and adjudicate a claim.

resource.name: Payer Diagnosis Present On Admission Diagnosis Type
resource.description: Payer Diagnosis Present On Admission Diagnosis Type

resource.name: Diagnosis Type -- Professional and Non-Clinician
resource.description: Payer Professional and Non-Clinician Diagnosis Type

resource.name: Provider Provider Contracting Status
resource.description: Indicates that the Provider has a contract with the Plan (regardless of the network) as of the effective date of service or admission.

resource.name: Claim Information Category
resource.description: Claim Information Category - Used as the discriminator for supportingInfo

resource.name: ExplanationOfBenefit_coverage
resource.description: The plan under which the claim was adjudicated

resource.name: ExplanationOfBenefit_facility
resource.description: Facility responsible for the goods and services

resource.name: ExplanationOfBenefit_Identifier
resource.description: The business/claim identifier of the Explanation of Benefit

resource.name: CARINBlueButton_ExplanationOfBenefit_Insurer_SearchParameter
resource.description: The party responsible for the claim

resource.name: ExplanationOfBenefit_ServiceDate
resource.description: Date of the service for the EOB

resource.name: organization
resource.description: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

resource.name: practitioner
resource.description: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organization

resource.name: Carin Bb CapabilityStatement
resource.description: This Section describes the expected capabilities of the Carin-bb Server actor which is responsible for providing responses to the queries submitted by the Carin-bb Requestors.
